queries.query:
from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "anomaly_score")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rolling_mean_10" or r["_field"] == "rolling_std_10")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "aq_level")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "gas_diff" or r["_field"] == "gas_diff_norm" or r["_field"] == "gas_norm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "hum" or r["_field"] == "hum_adjusted_gas" or r["_field"] == "hum_gas")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp" or r["_field"] == "temp_gas" or r["_field"] == "temp_hum")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mq")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "aq")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "air_quality")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "is_anomaly")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

spec.description: Demo dashboard to check POST req of esp32
spec.name: AQ-test
